title: The Pete Davidson and Margaret Qualley Thing Is Reportedly Over
text:
Photo: Getty Images

There is a season and a time to every purpose under heaven — or something — and the season of Margaret Qualley and Pete Davidson’s reported relationship has ended, reportedly. According to US Weekly, which broke the news of the union back in August, the Emmy nominated actress and the comedian who is very good at dating are no longer whatever they were for a few months around the summer and start of fall. (Or were they just a creation of US all along? Who can really say?) A “close source” tells the publication the two “remain friends,” which is nice to hear. You’d hate for some lovely boat rides around Venice and time spent at airports together to end acrimoniously. Qualley is both an up and coming actress and the daughter of the delightful Andie MacDowell, while Davidson has a fair amount of Hollywood heat around him and is currently shooting Suicide Squad. He also started the year dating Kate Beckinsale. So, these two are probably going to be just fine.
description: Pete Davidson and actress Margaret Qualley had reportedly been dating, and now they are reportedly not dating anymore.
